name: conscious Easing
description:
An old man seeks your help to rebuilt his 4th wall as it seems to have been broken.

Put up with his endless rants... OR NOT! Play the game however you would like and get 1 of 6 unique endings with multiples of alternate dialogue throughout. How fun! I love it already.

Controls:

Aim/MOVE: WASD/ArrowsMouse + Mouse

Action Buttons: Spacebar, L-Click(mouse)

(This is a Ludum Dare 49 Game that was completed a day late)
